panels.title: global_search SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of Global Search search requests meeting their duration target based on the 99.95th percentile of
the search with the same parameters.

panels.title: graphql_query SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of GraphQL queries meeting their duration target based on the urgency
of the endpoint. By default, a query should take no more than 1s. We're working
on making the urgency customizable in [this epic](https://gitlab.com/groups/gitlab-org/-/epics/5841).

Mutliple queries could be batched inside a single request.

panels.title: loadbalancer SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Measures aggregated HTTP request traffic through the HAProxy.
5xx responses are considered to be failures.



### Observability Tools

* [BigQuery: Main-stage: top paths for 5xx errors](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:342973e81d4a481d8055b43564d09728)

panels.title: rails_request SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of requests meeting their duration target based on the urgency
of the endpoint. By default, a request should take no more than 1s. But
this can be adjusted by endpoint.

Read more about this in the [documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/development/application_slis/rails_request_apdex.html).



### Observability Tools

* [📖 Kibana: Rails logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.status,json.method,json.meta.caller_id,json.meta.feature_category,json.path,json.request_urgency,json.duration_s,json.target_duration_s),filters:!((meta:(key:json.subcomponent,negate:!t,params:graphql_json,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.subcomponent:(query:graphql_json,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.type,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:api,type:phrase))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)
SLO

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} apdex
6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: workhorse SLI Apdex

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} error ratio
6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: workhorse SLI Error Ratio

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: workhorse SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of most web requests that pass through workhorse, monitored via the HTTP interface.
Excludes health, readiness and liveness requests. Some known slow requests, such as HTTP uploads,
are excluded from the apdex score.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/workhorse-api;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [🐞 Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/releases?environment=${environment})
* [🐞 Sentry issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/issues?environment=${environment})
* [📖 Kibana: Workhorse logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(key:json.type.keyword,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:api,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.type,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:api,type:phrase))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [📖 Kibana: Workhorse slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(key:json.type.keyword,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:api,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.type,params:api,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:api,type:phrase)))),(meta:(key:json.duration_ms,params:(gte:10000),type:range),query:(range:(json.duration_ms:(gte:10000))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',sort:!(!(json.duration_ms,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
